Come with us

Welcome to Journey - we're glad to have you! Journey is your local theatre group where folks of all ages get to play, create, and shine. We're all about boosting confidence and making great connections in our community through the magic of theatre. Whether you're a budding thespian or have never picked up a script, all are welcome. Come join the fun and let's make some memories together!

Who are we?

Journey came about after our founder accidentally found herself in an improvisation class on a sunny Sunday afternoon - and she never looked back. Together, with the rest of the team, they created Journey, an all access ages group designed with just three missions in mind:

1

Helping everyone find their voice and shine

2

Bringing our community closer, one story at a time

3

Making theatre a welcoming space for everyone

  • Journey HQ 123 Drama Lane, Dramatic City, DR4 MA
  • hello@journey.com
